casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Chauncey Lee MARSHALL. No. 126P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 10, 2008. Rudolph A. Ashton, III, Charles K. McCotter, Jr., New Bern, for Marshall. Lars F. Nance, Special Deputy Attorney General, G. Dewey Hudson, District Attorney, for State of NC. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 656 S.E.2d 709 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 20th day of March 2008 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th day of April 2008."
